plot.content:
Prototype of an ongoing collaboration with Arthur Simony, plotting words in spirals.

In some cases, the words aligned so well that they form very interesting spiral pattern inside the spiral.

prev.content:
Prototype of an ongoing collaboration with Arthur Simony, plotting words in spirals.

We dig even more the "color division" idea by combining circle, horizontal and vertical splits.

next.content:
Prototype of an ongoing collaboration with Arthur Simony, plotting words in spirals.

This is a rework of the bold idea by chosing to only make the bold effect every 3 words.
